name: Echo Dot (5th Gen) Smart Speaker with Alexa
product_description: Our most popular smart speaker with Alexa. Improved audio quality delivers clearer vocals, deeper bass, and vibrant sound in any room. Voice control your entertainment, smart home devices, and more. Help friends and family with accessibility features like Tap to Alexa, screen magnifier, and more.

name: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon Building Set
product_description: Kids can role-play as their favorite characters from the Star Wars saga with this LEGO Millennium Falcon construction toy. Features rotating gun turrets, 2 spring-loaded shooters, a lowering ramp, and an opening cockpit. Includes 7 Star Wars characters: Finn, Chewbacca, C-3PO, Lando Calrissian, Boolio, and 2 Porgs.
